Getting an error message every time I try to unpack the content, and I've tried everything I can think of to get it to extract! Any one else experiencing this and know what's wrong?!?!?!

v630 is actually an older version than v114, since v630 is basically a version of the mod, while the game version should be 93 or something around that.
So you should get v114, since its the latest so far.
Also, this content pack is created for those older versions up to v630, so its not tested on versions after that, which is why its recommended to be used on v630.

Hopefully, you'll understand all of this crap i wrote... ;)

GUIDE HOW TO GET THE "CONTENT PACK" TO WORK:

1. First of all i am using the game "The klub 17" Which i downloaded here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6747024/The_Klub_17_v630_(3D_SexVilla_2) 

2. If you have this version installed everything should work like a charm. 

3. Download the pack and then install, When installed many people wonder where do the files go and what do i have to do now? 

4.To finish the hole procedure go into "C:" or where you hade your game installed, look for the map called "TheKlub17".

5. When you you have found the map you'll have to start looking for at program called "Content Importer", this program should be found inside the "TheKlub17" map.

6. Doubble click the program and let it run, Be patient and let it run, it's going to take a couple of hours to finish, about 3-4 hours. The key here is just to be patient! :)

7. When the program is done, press "close" and start the game. Enjoy!

8. If you've followed all this steps everything should work just fine.
